tool.name: Minfi DMP

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
set <- get(load('$input1'))
genomeranges <- as.data.frame(ranges(set))
beta <- getBeta(set)
pheno <- read.table('$input2',skip=1)
type <- '$input3'
qCutoff <- as.numeric('$input4')
shrinkVar <- '$input5'
tab <- read.table('$input6')
tab <- tab[,-(11:14),drop=FALSE]
colnames(tab) <- c("seqname","source","feature","start","end","score","strand", "frame","attributes", "names")
tab[,"source"] <- NULL
tab[,"frame"] <- NULL
tab[,"attributes"] <- NULL
dmp <- dmpFinder(beta, pheno[,"V2"], type = type, qCutoff = qCutoff, shrinkVar = shrinkVar)
dmp[,"names"] <- rownames(dmp)
data <- merge(dmp, tab, by="names",sort = TRUE)
data <- data[c("seqname","start","end","names","score","strand", "feature","intercept", "f", "pval","qval")]
write.table(data, file= '$output1', quote = FALSE,col.names = FALSE, row.names = FALSE, sep = "\t")

param.name: input4
param.label: qCutoff Size
param.help: DMPs with an FDR q-value greater than this will not be returned.

param.name: input5
param.label: Variance Shrinkage
param.help: Variance shrinkage (shrinkVar=TRUE) is recommended when sample sizes are small

tool.help: The tool outputs differentially methylated positions (DMPs) with respect to a phenotype covariate. The phenotype may be categorical (e.g. cancer vs. normal) or continuous (e.g. blood pressure). Tool return multiple values: seqnames start end cpg names score strand feature intercept f pval qval
